title: AA Big Book Free
description:
Take the Big Book wherever you go!
Whether you're new to AA, or you're a seasoned veteran, this is the easiest and most useful app to aid in your recovery. The free version features the full text of the Big Book, prayers, personal stories, podcasts, meeting finder, and more!
Features:
The Big Book - The main 164 pages, Prayers, Personal Stories, and more!
- Join the discussion about individual chapters in the comment section!
- Adjustable font size
- Fully searchable
- Navigate by chapter
- Highlight sections of the book
Podcasts
- Listen to your favorite AA and recovery podcasts
- Discover new podcasts from other AA members
Speaker Tapes
- Listen to speaker tapes from meetings around the world
Sobriety Calculator
- Enter in your sobriety date and see how far you've come in days, weeks, months, and years
*Big Book and Alcoholics Anonymous are registered trademarks of AA World Services.
Terms: http://sobrietysoft.org/terms
